APP_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org/apps Please don't steal!

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org/apps Please don't steal!

STRING_SESSION.description: Go to https://bit.do/DogessRepl and paste the code you get here.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Required for updating the bot and other stuff get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account Please don't steal!

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Add the Heroku app name you specified above here. It helps to keep Doge up to date.

DOGELANG.description: Doge should talk in which language?: Available languages: en, tr

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Heroku.

ALIVE_NAME.description: If you don't give name, I'll auto detect your name.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Create a bot at https://t.me/BotFather and get the token of your bot.

DOGEPLUGIN.description: Do you want to activate extra plugins? Animation, fun, etc. includes plugins. If you open this, I'll automatically install all the plugins from our @DogePlugin channel. Write; True or False

DOGEHUB.description: Do you want to activate extra +18 obscene plugins? H*ntai, p*rn, etc. includes plugins. If you open this, I'll automatically install all the +18 plugins from our @DogeHUB channel. Write; True or False

PMLOGGER.description: Do you want me to automatically save PM and group-tagged messages? As long as I'm working, you can see deleted and edited messages with this feature. Write; True or False

TZ.description: Required for correct time on autopic/get time. Write your time zone location closest to your current location in English. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
